overview: The weirdest alien of the galaxy pays a visit to Earth...  Jerry Lewis is Kreton, a childish alien who, against his teacher's will leaves his planet to visit the Earth, and lands in the backyard of a famous television journalist who doesn't believe in UFOs and aliens. Wanting to study humans but not able to fully understand them, Kreton makes a mess out of it, generating a lot of comic situations.
tagline: The space race is on and Jerry's leading it... In reverse!
title: Visit to a Small Planet
